title: Sitting In God's Sunshine ... Resting In His Love
description: Women are busy! They are NOT looking for one more list of things to do or be. They are looking for encouragement, guidance, and assurance. Alicia invites readers to sit quietly in God's sunshine by offering a respite from the rush with warm reflections on learning to trust God. These inspirational thoughts and Bible truths are offered in short chapters of approximately 300-400 words. The tone is light, uplifting, joyful, and encouraging-no heavy theology, just helpful and hopeful inspiration. Section divisions, based on the title, help to develop the theme of
author: Alicia Britt Chole
